content: add a delicate touch to an outfit with this lovely crochet choker featured in aunt lydia s classic crochet thread you ll do single_crochet double_crochet and chain to achieve the delicate scalloped look we love it in a neutral tone for versatility but this pretty choker would be equally alluring in any shade that s flattering on you make a few and give to all your friends materials size no 2 1 5 mm steel crochet hook two 7mm jump rings one necklace clasp 4 10 cm metal chain
